trailingComments.value: 'A Dongner is a metaphysical entity believed to exist in a symbiotic relationship with the human soul. It does not have any control over the human body, nor can it interact directly with the physical realm in any way, however it has the same sensory input from the body as the soul it is attached to.';

'A Dongner is a metaphysical entity believed to exist in a symbiotic relationship with the human soul. It does not have any control over the human body, nor can it interact directly with the physical realm in any way, however it has the same sensory input from the body as the soul it is attached to.';
